meanings: [명사] confusion, chaos, mess; (소란) commotion; (무질서) disorder, [형용사] confused, chaotic, mixed up (※명사 앞에서는 쓰이지 않음)
be in a state of confusion

vlive.korean: [혼란] 그걸 어떻게 알아? [Confused] How do we know that? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.20
[뭔가 혼란스러워진 게임 룰 재정비하는 중...] [Rearranging the game rule that somehow got confusing...] View video OSEN : NCT DREAM, 노는 것만 봐도 힐링이다 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: [Rearranging the game rule that somehow got confusing...]

vlive.korean: [또다시 혼란에 빠지는 방탄이들이지만...] 아이템 어떻게 써요? [BTS members are struggling] How can I use the item? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [BTS members are struggling] How can I use the item?

vlive.korean: [하지만 혼란스러운 모습의 트둥이들?] [TWICE looked so confused?] View video TWICE : TWICE TV “MORE & MORE” EP.02
[혼란] - 근데... - 슈가 형 아니야? [Chaos] - But... - Isn't it SUGA? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.98

examples.korean: The peace talks broke up in disarray. 발음듣기 평화회담은 혼란스러운 가운데 결렬되고 말았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The peace talks broke up in disarray. 발음

examples.korean: Our plans were thrown into disarray by her arrival. 발음듣기 그녀가 도착하는 바람에 우리 계획이 혼란 속으로 빠지고 말았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our plans were thrown into disarray by her arrival. 발음

examples.korean: These policies could cause severe economic and social dislocation. 발음듣기 이들 정책이 심각한 경제적, 사회적 혼란을 초래할 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These policies could cause severe economic and social dislocation. 발음

examples.korean: a confusion as to what to do next 발음듣기 다음에 무엇을 할 것이냐에 대한 혼란 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a confusion as to what to do next 발음

examples.korean: The mixture of sights, smells and sounds around her made her senses reel. 발음듣기 그녀는 주변에서 느껴지는 광경, 냄새, 소리들 때문에 감각이 혼란스러웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The mixture of sights, smells and sounds around her made her senses reel. 발음
